Text: I'm thinking of compiling all of avenged sevenfold's music videos over the last decade+ and their live performances and extra video (like what came with the self titled album). Leave comments and let me know if you guys want an all inclusive torrent like this and i'll get it done. Enjoy and don't forget to support the bands you love!

You must have been reading my mind. We've been youtubing "So far Away" and I was thinking it would be nice to have a higher res version. 

Yes, I would love to see an all inclusive set. Be sure to keep the files from this torrent the same, so I can help seed them right away.

Wow, 275 MB file + 2.85 GB I've uploaded alone + only 3 seeds including myself = a buncha greedy b!tches!

GET WITH THE PROGRAM, PPL, SEED!!!!!

@db78636 you are welcome, enjoy the vids. I'll get working on collecting everything else avenged sevenfold and I'll probably throw in all the albums and b-sides too just so it's a full set of everything. I'll post a link in the comments when it's up so watch for it (probably a week out). Thanks for seeding! I know my upload speed is nowhere near where I want it to be but I'll seed for days on end trying to get stuff to you guys!
